QuestData.Title: Onward, to Light's Hope Chapel
QuestData.Description: Now that the boys are back, we can head out. You headed east?$b$bPlease, join us! I insist! Yesterday, we were in the Menders' Stead, and I was telling Tarenar, "We have two paladins and a shopkeeper, but you know what we really need? A $c!"$b$bDon't look at me that way! I'm serious! Come on, hop in the cart.
QuestData.LogDescription: Board Fiona's Caravan at the Thondroril River in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Hope the ride wasn't too bumpy for you.$b$bHave a look around the tower while the horses rest. It's no Light's Hope Chapel, but I'm sure you can find some way to keep yourself busy.
